byline.contributor: Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Beirut, and Nick Cumming-Bruce from Geneva.

abstract: Islamic State propagandists issue gruesome video showing group's fighters incinerating, drowning and blowing up men accused of aiding United States and American allies in bombing of its bases.
lead_paragraph: The video was among the most graphic from ISIS propagandists and appeared to reflect concern about civilian opposition in its areas of control.

headline.main: Grisly ISIS Video Seems Aimed at Quashing Resistance
headline.print_headline: Grim ISIS Video Seems Meant to Cow Civilians

snippet: The video was among the most graphic from ISIS propagandists and appeared to reflect concern about civilian opposition in its areas of control.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
